ResourceHeader.ResourceName: NASA THEMIS GBO Lac de Gras Station
ResourceHeader.Description:
Lac de Gras (EKAT) station is located in Lac de Gras, Northwest Territory, Canada. EKAT is part of the UCLA GBO Network.
Magnetic Latitude: 72.07 Magnetic Longitude: 305.74 UT of Magnetic Midnight: 8.9833 Magnetic Declination: 18.31
Magnetic coordinates obtained by calculation using the CGM online calculator with IGRF 2008 at altitude of 0 km. Magnetic declination obtained using CGM online calcualtor with IGRF 2007
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: We acknowledge NASA contract NAS5-02099 and V. Angelopoulos for use of data from the THEMIS Mission. Specifically:S. Mende and C. T. Russell for use of the GMAG data
